licensing: Do not copy proprietary text; author original summaries.
privacy: Do not include secrets or personal data in session records.
safety: Do not overwrite an existing session record.
Reject context and session_id values containing path separators or dot-segments.

acceptance_criteria: Fails when a session record already exists for the same session_id.
Fails when a required capability declaration is missing.
Logs a U.Work record when telemetry/log-work is available.

failure_modes: Invalid context or session_id value (not a safe path segment).
Failed to write the session record file.

inputs.description: Bounded context name used to locate runtime/contexts/<context> (must be a safe path segment).
inputs.name: context

inputs.description: Optional path to a capability declaration (defaults to runtime/contexts/<context>/capabilities/default.capability.yaml).
inputs.name: capability_ref

inputs.description: Optional purpose or summary for the session.
inputs.name: purpose

inputs.description: Optional initiator reference (person, team, or system).
inputs.name: initiated_by

inputs.description: Optional RoleAssignment label used when logging U.Work (default: Strategist).
inputs.name: role_assignment

inputs.description: Optional semicolon-delimited list of related DRR ids or paths.
inputs.name: decisions

inputs.description: Optional ISO-8601 timestamp_start override (used for deterministic testing).
inputs.name: timestamp_start

intent.goal: Start a new agent session record under runtime/contexts with deterministic naming.
non_goals: Does not assign roles beyond recording metadata.
Does not enforce Definition of Done checks.

name: Start Agent Session

outputs.description: Path to the generated session record markdown file.
outputs.name: session_record_path

procedure.instruction: Validate required inputs (context, session_id, title) and ensure they are safe path segments.
Create runtime/contexts/<context>/sessions if missing and ensure the session record does not already exist.
Construct the session record content with status=active and started_at timestamp.
If telemetry/log-work is available, log the session start with agent metadata when provided.

summary: Starts a new agent session record with deterministic naming.
